name: Steel Robots | 3D War Robot Fighting Game vs Tanks
name_original: Steel Robots | 3D War Robot Fighting Game vs Tanks
description:
Funny fighting war of the future game!

The war between robots and combat tanks has arrived!
A futuristic game in which battles to conquer the world are carried out by robots trained to kill.

Fight with your robot against military attack and win dodging each tank you find.
Use the super developed artificial intelligence of your amy's robot to dodge panzers and reach your military camp.
But beware!, war tanks try to go for you and they are everywhere.

This funny family game is suitable for children of all ages, so you can play in family with your kids.

Manage your realistic robot by clicking your mobile or tablet screen with the finger to the right and left side.
Avoid the tanks and gather impulse with the arrows you'll find on the floor of the hangar.
Don't run out of energy! Continue your race for survival until you run out of energy.

You will accumulate points based on how far you are able to get into this battle with your robot war.
Let's see how far you get!

Challenge your friends to see who can score the highest score in this exciting fight between robots and panzers. It's very addictive!

Play free now and run as fast as you can!

Twitter: @LabCave
Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
